items.content_html: Quiet Corner, Sea Ranch #searanch
items.content_text: Quiet Corner, Sea Ranch #searanch

items.content_html: Just found out that MaximumPC, a magazine I’ve followed since the 2000’s, has finally closed. They wrote good articles, didn’t have trashy advertisers and always added a hint of humor. It was as much of my computing journey as my college degree was. I’m going to miss it very much.
items.content_text: Just found out that MaximumPC, a magazine I’ve followed since the 2000’s, has finally closed. They wrote good articles, didn’t have trashy advertisers and always added a hint of humor. It was as much of my computing journey as my college degree was. I’m going to miss it very much.

items.content_html: I don’t know what I’m going to do with this, but I’m glad I got it in before the tariffs were announced.
items.content_text: I don’t know what I’m going to do with this, but I’m glad I got it in before the tariffs were announced.

items.content_html:
I was about to go down the rabbit hole of setting up yet another blog. But thankfully, I somehow ended up finding micro.blog, so here I am.

Ideally, I just want to post my musings, in the form of short bits of text and my photos, and have that cross-posted out to the rest of the Fediverse.
items.content_text:
I was about to go down the rabbit hole of setting up yet another blog. But thankfully, I somehow ended up finding micro.blog, so here I am.

Ideally, I just want to post my musings, in the form of short bits of text and my photos, and have that cross-posted out to the rest of the Fediverse.
